verses.verse: ( I Lift Up My Eyes to the Hills) שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> šîr A song לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> lam·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ of ascents. אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> ’eś·śā I lift up עֵ֭ינַי <WH5869> ‘ê·nay my eyes אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to הֶהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> he·hā·rîm the hills. מֵ֝אַ֗יִן <WH370> mê·’a·yin From where יָבֹ֥א <WH935> yā·ḇō come? עֶזְרִֽי׃ <WH5828> ‘ez·rî does my help

עֶ֭זְרִי <WH5828> ‘ez·rî My help מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> mê·‘im comes from יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> ‘ō·śêh the Maker שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> šā·ma·yim of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> wā·’ā·reṣ and earth.

אַל־ <WH408> ’al- He will not יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit·tên allow לַמּ֣וֹט <WH4132> lam·mō·wṭ to slip; רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <WH7272> raḡ·le·ḵā your foot אַל־ <WH408> ’al- will not יָ֝נ֗וּם <WH5123> yā·nūm slumber. שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <WH8104> šō·mə·re·ḵā your Protector

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin·nêh Behold, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- will neither יָ֭נוּם <WH5123> yā·nūm slumber וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō nor יִישָׁ֑ן <WH3462> yî·šān sleep. שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> šō·w·mêr the Protector יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ <WH8104> šō·mə·re·ḵā [is] your keeper; יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD צִ֝לְּךָ֗ <WH6738> ṣil·lə·ḵā [is] the shade עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on יַ֥ד <WH3027> yaḏ hand. יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> yə·mî·ne·ḵā your right

יוֹמָ֗ם <WH3119> yō·w·mām you by day, הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> haš·še·meš The sun לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- will not יַכֶּ֗כָּה <WH5221> yak·kek·kāh strike וְיָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> wə·yā·rê·aḥ nor the moon בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> bal·lā·yə·lāh by night.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ <WH8104> yiš·mā·rə·ḵā will guard you מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik·kāl from all רָ֑ע <WH7451> rā‘ evil; יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> yiš·mōr He will preserve אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> nap̄·še·ḵā your soul.

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD יִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> yiš·mār- will watch over צֵאתְךָ֥ <WH3318> ṣê·ṯə·ḵā and going, וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> ū·ḇō·w·’e·ḵā your coming מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> mê·‘at·tāh both now וְעַד־ <WH5704> wə·‘aḏ- and forevermore עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām ....
